  • Formula used to calculate CO_2 Emission
    • EF (Emission Factor)
    • \(N_{CropResidues}\)
      • Above Ground Residue Nitrogen
      • Below Ground Residue Nitrogen
      • Nitrogen content of the root returned to the soil
      • Nitrogen content of the exudates returned to the soil
      • Nitrogen content of the grain returned to the soil
      • Carbon input from product
      • Emission Factor

Formula

  • we do not consider these three variables in the Pyholos yet:
    • \(N_2O_{N_{SNdirect}}\),
    • \(N_2O_{N_{CRNmindirect}}\)
    • \(N_2O_{N_{ONdirect}}\)
  • \(N_{CropResidues}\) depend on the crop should be the same?
  • \(EF_{Topo}\) depends on P and PE
  • \(RF\_TX\) depends on soil texure

Formula used to calculate CO_2 Emission

\[ CO_2 = 273 \times \frac{44}{28} * N_2O_{N_{direct}} \]

\[ N_2O_{N_{direct}} = N_2O_{N_{SNdirect}} + N_2O_{N_{CRNmindirect}} + N_2O_{N_{ONdirect}} + N_2O_{N_{CropResidues}} \]

\[ N_2O_{N_{CropResidues}} = \href{#NCR}{N_{CropResidues}} \times \href{#ef}{EF} \]

\[ N_{CropResidues} = (\href{#AGRN}{AboveGround_{residue\_N}} + \href{#BGRN}{BelowGround_{residue\_N}}) \times {area} \]

EF (Emission Factor)

\[ EF = EF_{Base} * RF\_NS * RF\_Till *RF\_CS * RF\_AM \]

\[ (N_2O_{N_{SNdirect}} + N_2O_{N_{CRNmindirect}} + N_2O_{N_{ONdirect}} + EF_{Topo} \times RF\_TX \times \frac{1}{0.645} \times RF\_NS \times RF\_Till \times RF\_CS \times RF\_AM \times ((AboveGround_{residue\_N} + BelowGround_{residue\_N})*area)) \]

\(N_{CropResidues}\)

\[ N_{CropResidues} = (AboveGround_{residue\_N} + BelowGround_{residue\_N})*area \]

Above Ground Residue Nitrogen

For Annual and Perennial Plants,

\[ AboveGround_{residue\_N} = [\href{#grain}{Grian_N} + \href{#straw}{Straw_N}] \]

For Root Plant,

\[ AboveGround_{residue\_N} = \href{#straw}{Straw_N} \]

For Cover and Silage Plant, \[ AboveGround_{residue\_N} = \href{#grain}{Grian_N} \]

Below Ground Residue Nitrogen

For annual plants:

\[ BelowGround_{{residue_N}} = [\href{#root}{Root_N} + \href{#eroot}{Exudate_N}] \]

For perennial plants:

\[ BelowGround_{residue_N} = [\frac{S_r}{100} \times \href{#root}{Root_N}] + \href{#eroot}{Exudate_N} \]

For root plant, \[ BelowGround_{residue_N} = \href{#grain}{Grian_N} + \href{#eroot}{Exudate_N} \]

For cover and silage plant,

\[ BelowGround_{residue_N} = \href{#root}{Root_N} + \href{#eroot}{Exudate_N} \]

Nitrogen content of the root returned to the soil

  • \({Root}_N = \frac{C_r}{0.45} \times \frac{N_r}{1000}\)

Nitrogen content of the exudates returned to the soil

  • \({Exudate}_N = \frac{C_e}{0.45} \times \frac{N_e}{1000}\)

Nitrogen content of the straw returned to the soil

  • \({Straw_N} = \frac{C_s}{0.45} \times \frac{N_s}{1000}\)

Nitrogen content of the grain returned to the soil

  • \({Grain_N} = \frac{C_{p\_to\_soil}}{0.45} \times \frac{N_p}{1000}\)

Carbon input from product

\(C_{p\_to\_soil} = C_p \times \frac{S_p}{100}\)

  • \({Exudate}_N = \frac{C_e}{0.45} \times \frac{N_e}{1000}\)

    • \(C_r = C_p \times \frac{R_r}{R_p} \times \frac{S_r}{100}\)

    • \(C_e = C_p \times \frac{R_e}{R_p}\)

  • ${Grain_N} = $

  • ${Straw_N} = $

    • \(C_{p\_to\_soil} = C_p \times \frac{S_p}{100}\)
    • \(C_s = C_p \times \frac{R_s}{R_p} \times \frac{S_s}{100}\)
      • $C_p = [(yield + yield ) (1 - )] $
        • yield is defined by users
        • moisture content is default based on the crop type
        • Carbon concentration is default based on the crop type
        • \(S_p, N_p, N_s\)

Emission Factor

For humid environment:\(P > PE\)

\[ EF_{{CT}_{P}} = \exp^{0.00558 \times P - 7.7} \]

\[ EF_{Topo} = EF_{{CT}_{P}} \]

For dry environment \(PE \geq P\)

\[ EF_{{CT}_{PE}}= \exp^{0.00558 \times PE - 7.7} \]

  • For non-irrigated sites:

\[ EF_{Topo} = (EF_{{CT}_{PE}} \times FR_{Topo}) + [EF_{{CT}_{P}} \times (1 - FR_{Topo})] \]

For irrigated sites, the assumption is that the irrigation amount is equal to PE - P, thus making P = PE,

\[ EF_{Topo} = EF_{{CT}_{PE}} \]

Variables:

  • \(EF_{CT}\): Ecodistrict-level emission factor (\(kg \, N_2O\text{-}N \, (kg \, N)^{-1}\))
  • \(P\): Annual growing season precipitation (May – October)(mm)
  • \(PE\): Growing season potential evapotranspiration, by ecodistrict (May – October) (mm)

\[ EF_{Base} = (EF_{Topo} \times RF\_TX) \times \frac{1}{0.645} \]

\[ EF = EF_{Base} * RF\_NS * RF\_Till *RF\_CS * RF\_AM \]

\[ EF = (EF_{Topo} \times RF\_TX) \times \frac{1}{0.645} * RF\_NS * RF\_Till *RF\_CS * RF\_AM \]

\[ N_{CropResidues} = (AboveGround_{residue\_N} + BelowGround_{residue\_N})*area \]
